As Felix Frankfurter observed, "Justice must satisfy the appearance of justice." Excusing Juror 50's false answers because he believes his concealed history of sexual abuse did not affect his ability to serve as a fair and impartial juror does not satisfy the appearance of justice. Only a new trial would. The Court should therefore order a new trial.
